title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Women's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: May 18, 2018 / 8:44 PM / Updated 17 hours ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Women's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 7 Min Read May 19 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Rome Masters Women's Singles matches on Friday ..
